name: rhf-wizard
author: kennyhei <kenny_heinonen@hotmail.com>
description: Multistep wizard for React Hook Form

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.install:local: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && npm run build && npm pack && tar -xzf rhf-wizard-$PACKAGE_VERSION.tgz && mv package rhf-wizard && yarn add ./rhf-wizard
scripts.uninstall:local: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && yarn remove rhf-wizard && rm -rf rhf-wizard-$PACKAGE_VERSION.tgz rhf-wizard
